dct_title_s: Descriptio fluminum Rheni, Vahalis et Mosae
dct_alternative_sm: Descriptio fluminum Rheni, Vahalis et Mosae : a Rheno berca ad goricomium usque, comprehendens imperium Noviomagense, Batavium, Tielae et bomilii in sulas, regionesque conterminas.
dct_description_sm: 2 maps on 1 sheet ; sheet 45 x 54 cm
North oriented to the top on top map; north oriented to the top right corner on bottom map.
Shows the northern Rhine from Gorinchem, Netherlands to Wesel, Germany.
Does not match any states listed in Van der Krogt.
Copy differs only slightly from Van der Krogt's 3705:1.1 in that the wording in the publishing credit varies.
From the Appendix Atlas of the British Isles and Northern Europe, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan.
dct_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Appendix Atlas of the British Isles and Northern Europe.
Hondius, Hendrik, 1597-1651. Appendix Atlas of the British Isles and Northern Europe.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
